Nightshift keeps his supplies minimal and keeps only what is essential for =
the mission.  Once doing that he slips back into beast mode as he too, prep=
ares to go topside.

" I'm tell'n ya Polarclaw, that tower's been hacked an=
d whoever the hacker is, is gonna wish they minded their own business when =
we get through with 'em."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grat=
eful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and =
friends.

On Nov 11, 2011, at 6:24 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@gmail.=
com> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift braces for impact as he narrows h=
is optics.
> >
> > " Why didn't that auto defense system recognize us as Ma=
ximals? It
> > should've left our shuttle alone." Unless it's been tampered=
 with. But
> > how?"
> 
> The 'impact' is actually quite a bit softer than =
one might have first
> had imagined, that is until the snow bank fell over =
the top of the
> shuttle. They had been cusioned by snow, and POLAR CLAW ha=
d put some
> ice and stone between them and the tower so they were out of t=
he
> firing arcs.
> 
> "All right troops!" POLAR CLAW said as he stepped ba=
ck into the cabin
> area of the shuttle, where NIGHTSHIFT and the others we=
re positioned.
> "Let's get ready."
> 
> Looking over at NIGHTSHIFT he gest=
ured towards the door. "You want to
> know why our own tower was targeting =
us? So do I."
> 
> RAMULUS hit a button next to the door causing it to slid=
e open,
> allowing a snow drift to spill into the first few feet of the cab=
in
> space along with the frigid Antarctic air. "Let's get ready and get
> =
topside."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

> Nightshift braces for impact as he narrows his optic=
s.<br>
><br>
> " Why didn't that auto defense system recognize us as =
Maximals?  It<br>
> should've  left our shuttle alone." Unless it's been=
 tampered with.  But<br>
> how?"<br>
<br>
The 'impact' is actually quite=
 a bit softer than one might have first<br>
had imagined, that is until the=
 snow bank fell over the top of the<br>
shuttle. They had been cusioned by =
snow, and POLAR CLAW had put some<br>
ice and stone between them and the to=
wer so they were out of the<br>
firing arcs.<br>
<br>
"All right troops!" P=
OLAR CLAW said as he stepped back into the cabin<br>
area of the shuttle, w=
here NIGHTSHIFT and the others were positioned.<br>
"Let's get ready."<br>
=
<br>
Looking over at NIGHTSHIFT he gestured towards the door. "You want to<=
br>
know why our own tower was targeting us? So do I."<br>
<br>
RAMULUS hit=
 a button next to the door causing it to slide open,<br>
allowing a snow dr=
ift to spill into the first few feet of the cabin<br>
space along with the =
frigid Antarctic air. "Let's get ready and get<br>
topside."<br>
